name: A nigth in the forest
description:
IMPORTANT WARNING: the game takes a while to load, it isnt a bug, its the engine itself

Hello! My name is Felipe Verri and im a 12 year old game developer, it has been a fun journey so far

I started making this game a long time ago, i leaved it for a long time because the project was to big for me at the time. I saw the project and i want to continue it, it can be a really cool game.

This game is just started, there are a lot of things to do to finish it. Thanks you for playing it, and if you can share it!, it will help me out a lot. You can check down here to see how it continues. You can expect the next version in 1 month  if nothing goes wrong. 

Here is how the game will continue:

1)I will need to start making money, i have a plan wich on 7 or 13 days it will become a constant source of money

2)I will start taking an 2d animation course as i develop the game, the character will have proper animations

3)It will have an engine update, godot is really painful to use on large projects like this, i will use unity for the next update(and probably for the rest of the updates)

4)Before i start making any levels or coding, i will create 2 or 3 different game stories and i will choose the best one

5)after all the preparations, i will start creating the game
